title: OOK 15 ft. Invisible Hanging Wire, 50 lbs. Capacity, Self Tying Wires, Ideal for Picture Hanging and Planters
description: OOK 50104 OOK 50lb Invisible Hanging Wire , Since its inception in 1964, OOK Picture Hanging Hardware Co. has developed more innovative picture hanging hardware solutions than any other manufacturer in the world. Our original commitment to museums and art galleries in the 1960 s forged an R & D department focusing on creating solutions for unique, high value, hanging challenges. Many of these new developments became important picture hanging innovations for both professional and consumer alike. OOK 50104 OOK 50lb Invisible Hanging Wire. Features: Self tying wires that wrap around themselves and stay Ties like string, cuts like string but holds like steel Used to hang pictures, planters and are great for window treatments Soft and flexible Hands stay clean and cut free Extremely strong and invisible hanging wire is undetectable to the eye 15' roll Hold up to 50 lbs. Carded.
